Text: mm how do i even start with this.. just downloaded it and stuck atm.. sorry if im to noob lol :)

Use this tool to identify what codecs u need to playback video and audio. Works by opening the movie/audio file with Gspot. 

Then download and install the most recent version of the appropriate codecs.

http://www.headbands.com/gspot/

Here's what i came across when google'ing "x264":

http://www.free-codecs.com/download/x264_Video_Codec.htm
Audio still doesnt work, probably whole track is damaged, any codec cant decode this (even Sonic EAC3 codec)
